description:
I am debugging some database issues on a new node.

I'm building Kolla containers, configured to be centos distro, off of latest.

$ nova-manage --version
14.0.0

$ rpm -ql | grep nova
rpm: no arguments given for query

I wanted to have the progress for nova-manage to be output to the console instead of syslog.

$ nova-manage --debug --verbose --nouse-syslog db sync
Option "verbose" from group "DEFAULT" is deprecated for removal.  Its value may be silently ignored in the future.

Regardless of if --nouse-syslog is present or not in the command line, it's logging to syslog, as far as I can tell.
title: nova-manage ignores --nouse-syslog

I tested this with nova 14.0.0 and I could not re-produce the issue in Ubuntu.

I'll try again with CentOS but it seems that your logs are being re-routed to syslog and hidden from console which is a little odd. Could this be at the O/S level or configuration change in the logging mechanism for nova?
